_____________________________________________________________________________________


There has been an explosion of clinical, basic science, and translational research leading to a better understanding of the physiology and disease processes of the gastrointestinal system of children. This book explores the entirety of pediatric gastroenterology, from the gastrointestinal tract, liver, and pancreas to associated nutrition, radiographic, and endoscopic considerations. The book includes histologic, radiographic, and endoscopic images along with illustrations to convey a complete understanding of disease processes. Each chapter ends with a list of recommended readings to facilitate further study.
